heroDescription: Discover a hybrid teaching platform trusted by thousands of teachers. Best tool for online testing, as well as in-class paper exam grading with a mobile answer sheet scanner app.
aiTestDescription: Our AI-powered test generator simplifies test creation by automatically generating questions based on your uploaded content or chosen topic.
scanningDescription: Print out answer sheets and grade them in seconds with our answer sheet scanner app. Grades are automatically given and results are saved for you to browse and analyse.
aiGeneratorSubtitle: Transform your content into engaging assessments in seconds. Examica's AI generates a variety of question types, including multiple-choice, true/false, and open-ended, from your uploaded text or files (like lecture notes, textbooks, or presentations).
methodAiDescription: Upload your content (text or files) and let our AI automatically generate a variety of questions for you.
methodImportDescription: Already have a test ready? Import it directly from a file containing your questions and answer choices.
methodCreateDescription: Design your test from scratch using our advanced question editor. Customize every aspect of your assessment.
creationMethodsSubtitle: Examica offers flexibility in how you build your assessments. Choose from three methods to suit your needs:
footerDescription: Examica is the #1 platform designed for teachers. We provide time-saving, performance-enhancing, cost-effective solutions at every step from test-building and grading to analyzing and sharing data.
copyright: Copyright Â© 2025 Examica. All rights reserved.
loginSubtitle: Log in to your Examica account
registrationNewsletter: I want to receive email notifications with news, promotions, and tips for using Examica.
registrationAge: I am 16 years old or older.
registrationAgreePart1: I have read and agree to the
createTestOptionScratchDescription: Create a test from scratch using our advanced creator.
createTestOptionAIDescription: Generate questions based on the content you upload or selected topic.
createTestOptionImportDescription: Import a test from a file containing a list of questions.
